entry.title: This Week in Coins: Prices Continue Downward, Central African Republic Adopts Bitcoin, Canada Says 'Nah'
entry.summary: Elsewhere, Buenos Aires Mayor Horacio Rodriguez Larreta gave a presentation on optimizing city government with Web3 tech.

entry.title: Leading NFT Marketplace OpenSea Now Accepting ApeCoin
entry.summary: The Ethereum-based governance token used in the BAYC ecosystem has skyrocketed in value over the last seven days.

entry.title: Why Ethereum Mergers Love Lido
entry.summary: Unlike other staking services, it gives a token in return called Staked ETH that can be plugged back into various DeFi protocols.

entry.title: Beeple: Next Era of NFTs Will Focus on 'Emotional Connection and Utility'
entry.summary: Beeple sat for a wide-ranging conversation with Decrypt at the museum in Italy where his digital sculpture HUMAN ONE is going on display.

entry.title: What You Need to Know About the Bored Ape Yacht Club’s Otherside NFT Drop
entry.summary: The first opportunity to ape into the Bored Ape metaverse is coming on Saturday. Here’s the latest on the potentially huge NFT drop.

entry.title: What Are Moonbirds? These Ethereum Owl NFTs Are Soaring
entry.summary: Kevin Rose’s collection of 10,000 pixel owls has quickly become one of the most valuable NFT collections around.

entry.title: Coinbase Changes Listing Policy for New Tokens After Allegations of Front-Running
entry.summary: Coinbase will no longer publish a shortlist of assets it's considering listing, instead only publicizing new listings after a decision has been made.

entry.title: Central African Republic Didn't Share Bitcoin Adoption Plans With Central Bank: Report
entry.summary: This week, the Central African Republic became the second country to make Bitcoin legal tender.

entry.title: Want a Bored Ape NFT? It’ll Now Cost You Nearly $430,000 in Ethereum
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club NFTs have hit a new record “floor” price ahead of this weekend’s big Otherside metaverse launch.

entry.title: What are Decentralized Apps (Dapps)?
entry.summary: Decentralized applications, or dapps, are a radical new way of building applications, using blockchain to do away with centralized middlemen.

entry.title: What is ERC-721? The Ethereum NFT Token Standard
entry.summary: ERC-721 is a token standard for non-fungible tokens on Ethereum. A pillar of the ecosystem, it supports billions of dollars worth of NFTs.

entry.title: Cloudflare Blocks Massive DDoS Attack on Crypto Platform
entry.summary: A recent DDoS attack on a “crypto launchpad” attempted to flood the platform with 15.3 million requests per second, reported Cloudflare.

entry.title: Cardano Creator Hoskinson: US Regulators 'Not Prepared' to Handle Crypto
entry.summary: During a recent event, Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson explained why American regulators are struggling to deal with crypto.

entry.title: DeFi Transactions at 1-Year Low, NFTs Set All-Time High in Q1: Report
entry.summary: Blockchain games, a category that's attracted $2.5 billion in VC funding, accounted for 78% of all transactions, says DappRadar.

entry.title: South Korean Crypto Exec Arrested for Leaking Military Secrets to North: Report
entry.summary: A crypto exchange executive and a captain of the South Korean army have been arrested for allegedly leaking military secrets to North Korea.

entry.title: Bored Ape Yacht Club’s ApeCoin Soars as Community Mulls DAO Proposals
entry.summary: The token powering the ApeDAO, ApeCoin, has seen a price spike over the past 24 hours as the community votes on several proposals.

entry.title: US Department of Labor Shares ‘Grave Concerns’ on Fidelity’s Bitcoin Retirement Move
entry.summary: The U.S. Labor Department had some choice words regarding Fidelity’s move to open up its retirement accounts to Bitcoin.

entry.title: 'Bitcoin Jesus' Comes Back to Twitter, Says He Likes Dogecoin
entry.summary: After a year of silence, the Bitcoin Cash evangelist returned to Twitter to share his views on Dogecoin and Elon Musk.

entry.title: After Slow First Week, Coinbase NFT Marketplace Records $100K in Daily Sales
entry.summary: Coinbase NFT saw less than 900 transactions since its beta launch last week, but volume spiked Thursday.

entry.title: Domain Names Are Fueling the Latest NFT Craze on Ethereum—Here’s Why
entry.summary: The Ethereum Name Services has generated $1.3 million in sales over the last 24 hours, as .eth domain sales surge 2,300%.

entry.title: House Bill Aims to Give CFTC Authority to Regulate Crypto Exchanges, Stablecoins
entry.summary: The Digital Commodity Exchange Act of 2022 builds off the Commodity Exchange Act to "fill gaps" in crypto regulation not fully addressed by either the CFTC nor the SEC.

entry.title: Robinhood’s Crypto Revenue Rises in Q1 Despite Overall Downturn
entry.summary: The stock and crypto trading service’s overall revenue dropped 18% last quarter, but its crypto business is headed in the other direction.

entry.title: Telegram Users Can Now Send Crypto via the Messaging App
entry.summary: The Open Network is enabling users to send Toncoin via Telegram Chat.

entry.title: Panama Passes Law to Regulate Bitcoin, Legally Recognize DAOs
entry.summary: The law will regulate the use of cryptocurrencies such as BTC in the Central American country, as well as provide a legal framework for DAOs and STOs.

entry.title: FTX’s Mercedes F1 Ethereum NFTs Come With a Piece of the Actual Car
entry.summary: You can own part of Lewis Hamilton’s or George Russell’s F1 car with FTX’s NFTs for next weekend’s Miami Grand Prix.

entry.title: What Are Smart Contracts and How Do They Work?
entry.summary: Smart contracts are at the heart of the blockchain revolution, providing the building blocks for decentralized applications (dapps).

entry.title: Bitrefill to Launch Service Letting US Users Pay Bills With Crypto
entry.summary: American crypto enthusiasts will soon be able to pay their utilities, mortgage payments, and even taxes with Bitcoin.

entry.title: DeGods Solana NFT Project to Buy Team Stake in Ice Cube’s BIG3 League
entry.summary: DeGods will obtain all of the top-tier Ethereum NFT ownership stakes in Killer 3s, one of the teams in Ice Cube’s 3-on-3 basketball league.

entry.title: Twitter Cancels Earnings Call, Citing Pending $44B Musk Deal
entry.summary: The social mead company also revealed a 2019 error that led it to report inflated active user figures.

entry.title: FTX Announces $1 Billion Charity Fund and First Print Ad Campaign Starring Gisele Bundchen
entry.summary: FTX officially launches its first ad campaign, "In On," which features CEO Sam Bankman-Fried and supermodel Gisele Bundchen.

entry.title: John Legend's Our Happy Company Raises $7.5 Million for NFT Music Platform
entry.summary: Animoca Brands and Infinity Ventures led the seed round for the company, whose founders include singer John Legend and Twitch co-founder Kevin Lin.

entry.title: Ripple's Fight Against the SEC: How the Case Is Going and How it Might End
entry.summary: SEC v. Ripple, a case of huge significance for the crypto industry, has been dragging forward. Here's a close look at where things stand.

entry.title: Finnish Authorities Expected to Donate Seized Bitcoin to War-Torn Ukraine
entry.summary: Finland’s government is reportedly planning to hand over a “significant part” of 1,981 Bitcoin seized from criminals to Ukraine.

entry.title: What are ERC-20 Tokens, Gas and Ether? Ethereum's Architecture Explained
entry.summary: Ethereum is underpinned by three core features: Gas, Ether and the ERC-20 token standard that allows cryptocurrencies to be built atop it.

entry.title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams: 'Listen to Those Within the Crypto Industry'
entry.summary: New York's Bitcoin-friendly mayor called upon regulators to listen to those working in the crypto industry.

entry.title: Bright Moments DAO Brings Crypto to Life at NFT Art Berlin
entry.summary: The Bright Moments DAO brought the metaverse to the meatspace at Berlin’s iconic Kraftwerk venue for a 10-day celebration.

entry.title: Coinbase Lists Competitor Binance’s Stablecoin BUSD
entry.summary: BUSD is the fourth largest stablecoin by market cap.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Helped Create Zcash Privacy Coin
entry.summary: The NSA whistleblower was one of six people holding part of a private key to create Zcash.

entry.title: BlackRock Launches Its First Crypto-Exposed ETF With Sizable Coinbase Allocation
entry.summary: The world’s largest asset manager is giving its clients exposure to crypto and blockchain companies.

entry.title: Peter Thiel’s Founders Fund and Pantera Capital Lead $20M Round for Ondo Finance
entry.summary: Ondo plans to further develop its permissionless, decentralized investment bank, which provides DeFi vaults and liquidity to investors and DAOs.

entry.title: Inside the Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Restaurant in L.A.
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin interviews Kevin Seo, co-founder of Bored & Hungry, the BAYC-inspired burger joint in Los Angeles. Video shot and edited by Decrypt's Jason Nelson.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 8: All About Avalanche with John Wu
entry.summary: Ava Labs president John Wu talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the meteoric rise of so-called "Ethereum killer" Avalanche (he hates that phrase), its utility and usability, AVAX token, tribalism in crypto, the SEC and regulation, and NFT backlash.

entry.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'
entry.summary: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.

entry.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse
entry.summary: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.

entry.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.

entry.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 7: pplpleasr and the NFT Art Revolution
entry.summary: Emily Yang aka pplpleasr never thought she'd be an online celebrity. But in 2021 an NFT version of a digital ad she did for Uniswap sold for $525,000 to a DAO of her fans, and now she's among the most famous NFT artists. She speaks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the rise of NFT art, the traditional art world taking it seriously, NFT haters, and which NFT marketplaces can beat OpenSea.

entry.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’
entry.summary: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.
